import React,{useContext,useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { GlobalState } from "../../../GlobalState"; import { render } from 'react-dom'; export default function Payment() { const state = useContext(GlobalState); const [infor] = state.userAPI.infor const [cart, setCart] = state.userAPI.cart; const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const [shipFee,setShipFee] = useState(0); const [totalCash,setTotalCash] = useState(''); const setFee = (e) => { setShipFee(e.target.value) }; const checkMulti = () => { if (cart.length > 1){ return cart.length+" products" }else return cart.length+" product" }; useEffect(() => { const calcTotal = () => { const total = cart.reduce((prev,item) => { return prev + (item.price * item.quantity) },0) setTotal(total) } calcTotal() }, [cart]) return (

1. Choose shipping method

2. Choose payment method

3. Choose delivery time

Payment Information

Delivery Address

{infor.name}

Your cart

{checkMulti()} Details
{ cart.map((item) => { return(

{item.quantity}x

{item.title}

${item.price}

) }) }
Provisional
${total}
VAT ${total * 10/100}
Shipping Fee $10

Total Cash:

${parseInt(shipFee) + total + total*10/100}
) }
